nodes.text: The Caliginous Automaton of Tomo-Reth was a black droid of more than fifty meters in height that sat upon a brick throne on the planet Tomo-Reth. It amazed visitors by breathing fire. The droid was destroyed in the year 14,743 BBY during the Herglic Crush. The Automaton was included in the list of the Twenty Wonders of the Galaxy by the historian Vicendi in his 10,000 BBY publication Arturum Galactinum.

First mentioned by Daniel Wallace in The Essential Atlas, who suggested he might've been subconsciously referencing the giant statue of the robot Bender from the animated series Futurama, in the episode "A Pharaoh to Remember".
